name: htmlruby
title: HTML Ruby
description: Adds support for rendering of ruby annotation
author: sakai135

preferences.name: rubyTextSize
preferences.title: Ruby text size
preferences.description: The size of the ruby text. 100 is the same size as the base text. Default is 55.

preferences.name: rubyLineHeight
preferences.title: Ruby line height
preferences.description: The space between base and ruby text. Adjust this to your preference. 100 means that the baseline of the ruby text should be just above the top of the base text. Default is 100.

preferences.name: adjustLineHeight
preferences.title: Adjust line height
preferences.description: If enabled, HTML Ruby will adjust the line height to make space for the ruby text. When disabled, the ruby may overlap the text above it.

preferences.name: spaceRubyText
preferences.title: Space ruby text
preferences.description: If enabled, HTML Ruby will space out the ruby and base text. When disabled, ruby and base text will be centered.

preferences.name: processInsertedContent
preferences.title: Process inserted content
preferences.description: If enabled, HTML Ruby will process dynamically inserted content by other Firefox extensions and such. Disabling will provide a slight increase in performance for pages with heavy DOM interaction.
